deposit.error: ❌ You don't have this money in your wallet.
deposit.embed: You have deposited :coin: `{amount}` in the bank.

pay.error: ❌ You cannot use this command with a bot.
pay.error2: ❌ You cannot use this command with you.
pay.error3: ❌ You don't have this money in your wallet.

with-draw.error: ❌ You don't have this money in the bank.
with-draw.embed: You have withdrawn :coin: `{amount}` from the bank.

work.error: ❌ You cannot use this command now.
work.embed: You went to work and got paid :coin: `{earned}`.

help.embed2:
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/balance` - Displays a user's balance.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/deposit` - Deposit money in the bank.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/pay` - Pay money to a user.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/richest` - Displays the richest users.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/with-draw` - Withdraws money from the bank.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/work` - Work and get money.
help.embed4:
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/clear-queue` - Clears the song queue.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/leave` - Leave the voice channel.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/loop` - Enables/Disables the song loop.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/now-playing` - Displays the currently playing song.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/pause` - Pause the song.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/play` - Plays a song.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/queue` - Displays the song queue.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/resume` - Resume the song.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/skip-to` - Skips the song to the indicated position.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/skip` - Skip the song.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/volume` - Sets the volume of the song.
help.embed6:
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/profile description` - Sets the profile description.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/profile follow` - Follow a user.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/profile register` - Create a profile.
<:emoji_1:987398741780750426> `/profile unfollow` - Stop following a user.
<:emoji_1:987398741780 `/profile view` - Displays a user's profile.
